author: ddas
msg: MAPREDUCE-1701. Fixes a problem to do with exception handling in delegation-token renewals. Contributed by Boris Shkolnik.

author: rhuijben
msg: Make 'svn patch' handle adding directories over deleted nodes. This
feature was documented as 'needs wc-ng', while replacing directories just
works in 1.6. The old implementation just needed fixing for single db.
And even with multi-db we allow replacing a deleted file with a
Don't copy a constant input argument to a tempvar. Allow replacing
any deleted node as long as there is no in-wc obstruction.
Just create all directory levels at once, to support single-db (where
deleted directories do not exist) and not-single db (where they do)
(patch_add_new_dir): Update expected values to expect an addition

author: sdeboy
msg: Some locales represent simpledateformatted-text with characters other than alpha/numeric (dot in French locales for the month)..use /S when building the pattern that can parse the timestamp format instead of /w to account for that situation

author: olga
msg: PIG-1517: Pig needs to support keywords in the package name (aniket486 via olgan)
